liquibase.database.template.JdbcTemplate

liquibase.database.template.JdbcTemplate Class Reference

Inherited by liquibase.database.template.JdbcOutputTemplate.

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Class to simplify execution of SqlStatements.

Based heavily on Spring's JdbcTemplate.

Note: This class is currently intended for LiquiBase-internal use only and may change without notice in the future
